description: London Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, has a requirement to purchase one (1) Real-Time PCR system.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Real-Time PCR System

**Reference Number:** cb-7650-99561944
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-05 14:00:00
**Location:** London, Canada

**Notice to Suppliers:**

The London Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, invites bids for the purchase of one (1) Real-Time PCR System.

**Requirements:**

* UNSPSC Code: *41102400 (Laboratory heating and drying equipment)
* Procurement Category: *Government Direct (GD)

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Tender Proposal Submission:**

Instructions and the tender submission process can be found in the attached documents.

Note: The tender was announced as a **Competitive - Selective tendering** process, as indicated in the original document. The selection criteria is based on **Lowest Price**, as per the government tender policy.

**Contract Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contact Person: Jacques Toussaint, Email: jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca, Telephone: (438) 455-8237

**Attachments:**

The tender notice and instructions are attached to this announcement in PDF format. ([link to attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7650/npp--e60pv-19equi.pdf).)

**Note:**

The tender closing date mentioned above is `Expired`, but the attachments are still accessible for reference purposes only.
